name: electrobun
description: Build ultra fast, tiny, and cross-platform desktop apps with Typescript.
author: Blackboard Technologies Inc.

scripts.build:cli: mkdir -p bin && vendors/bun/bun build src/cli/index.ts --compile --outfile bin/electrobun
scripts.dev: bun install && bun build:dev && bun build:cli && cd ../kitchen && bun install && bun build:dev && bun start
scripts.dev:clean: cd ../kitchen && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf vendors/cef && cd ../package && bun dev
scripts.dev:canary: bun install && bun build:release && bun build:cli && cd ../kitchen && bun install && bun build:canary
scripts.dev:stable: bun install && bun build:release && bun build:cli && cd ../kitchen && bun install && bun build:stable
scripts.push:beta: bun run typecheck && bun scripts/push-version.js beta
scripts.push:patch: bun run typecheck && bun scripts/push-version.js patch
scripts.push:minor: bun run typecheck && bun scripts/push-version.js minor
scripts.push:major: bun run typecheck && bun scripts/push-version.js major
scripts.push:stable: bun run typecheck && bun scripts/push-version.js stable
scripts.test: bun install && bun build:dev && bun build:cli && cd ../tests && bun install && bun build:dev && bun start
